metadata.title: CVE-2023-52805 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: jfs:fix array-index-out-of-bounds in diAlloc Currently there is not checkagainst the agno of the iag while allocating new inodes to avoidfragmentation problem. Added the check which is required.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
